alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 8:02PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...LIGHT ICE ACCUMULATIONS POSSIBLE... .A winter weather system will skirt the northern and eastern portions of the area tonight into Saturday morning, bringing some light ice accumulations to the area. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Harding County, Perkins County, the Northern Meade County Plains, Ziebach County and Haakon County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
